Suicide Watch Observation Log
Name of Inmate on watch: Epstein Reg #: 76318-054 Date: 7/24/19
Time Observations: Briefly note your observations. Initial all entries. Initials
0300 am I/m Epstein appears to be sleeping at this time
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
0315 am I/m Epstein appears to be sleeping on
0330 am I/m Epstein appears to be sleeping on
0345 am I/m Epstein has shifted to his right side, appears to be sleeping at this time and
0400 am I/m Epstein appears to be sleeping
0415 am I/m Epstein appears to be sleeping
0430 am I/m Epstein woke at 0425 am to ask the time, and he appears to be drinking back to sleep
0445 am I/m Epstein woke to use the bathroom (urine) and drank water before asking the time, and he is sitting on the bed
0500 am I/m Epstein is laying on his back in the bed, he appears to have fallen asleep
0515 am I/m Epstein appears to be sleeping
0530 am I/m Epstein appears to be sleeping, the C/O on shift just checked on him
0545 am I/m Epstein appears to be sleeping
0600 am I/m Epstein appears to be sleeping
0615 am I/m Epstein has woken up to use the bathroom (urine) and has drunk some water, he asked what time was breakfast and medical
Note to all observers: Legibly print and sign your name at the beginning of your shift.
6
